Meet Our Team

“From the first phone call to your first visit, you will feel the warmth, sincerity, and empathy.
Our team members will ensure you feel comfortable every step of the way!
A dental visit doesn’t have to be scary or dreary. We’re pretty sure you’ll look forward to every visit.”

MEET OUR AMAZING TEAM

At the core of our dental practice is a friendly team of professionals that are dedicated to your utmost comfort and optimal oral health. We view each patient as a unique individual, and tailor each treatment to your specific needs. As part of our commitment to providing close, personalized attention to every patient, we want to encourage patient communication. Please know that we are here to provide outstanding patient care, and that we value the trust you have placed in us.

We treat each and every patient like our family in the most conservative way. We actually have fun practicing dentistry and meeting new people!

Our team of caring, compassionate and gentle women

Dr. Bae

Kinnelon and Butler Dentist

Dr. Bae graduated in 2008 from NYU College of Dentistry where she was enrolled in the accelerated 7 year BADDS program. She went on to further her education with a one year general practice residency at Hackensack University Medical Center in Hackensack, NJ. Upon completion of her residency program, she was asked to return as an attending faculty at the hospital. She is currently an attending medical staff at Hackensack Meridian Health where she teaches and oversees dental residents.

Patricia

Registered Dental Hygienist

“Pat” as she is affectionately known amongst all patients, has been with the practice for more than 30 years with Drs. Wakai, Stamler and now, Dr. Bae. She graduated with Associates in Applied Science Degree in Dental Hygiene from New York Technical College in Brooklyn, NY.

Pat is passionate about dental education and health care. She is an extraordinary individual who truly cares for patients as if they were family. She strives to always educate the patient and help the patient feel as comfortable as possible in the dental setting. Pat is up-to-date with continuing education courses and provides a full spectrum of dental treatments such as: perform scaling root planings, apply sealants, apply desensitizing agent, apply fluoride, take alginate impressions, fabricate nightguards/bleaching trays/mouthguards, perform prophylaxis, take vital signs, examine soft and hard tissues of the head, neck and oral cavity, take dental x-rays and more. She can provide extra comfort using Oraqix and topical gel.

Monica

Certified X-Ray Technician, Dental Assistant

Monica joined us after being our lovely patient for over 5 years.
